# Compliance Manual - Table of Contents
## Investment Adviser Compliance Program

---

## INTRODUCTION

This Compliance Manual establishes the policies and procedures of **[MANAGEMENT COMPANY NAME] LLC** (the "Adviser") to ensure compliance with the Investment Advisers Act of 1940 and related regulations.

**Designated Chief Compliance Officer (CCO):** [Name]  
**Effective Date:** [Date]  
**Last Reviewed:** [Date]

---

## TABLE OF CONTENTS

### SECTION 1: COMPLIANCE PROGRAM OVERVIEW
- 1.1 Purpose and Scope
- 1.2 Regulatory Framework
- 1.3 Chief Compliance Officer Responsibilities

- 1.5 Compliance Calendar

- 3.4 Cross Trading
- 3.5 Principal Transactions
- 3.6 Aggregation of Orders

  - Position Limits (TQQQ: max [40]% of NAV)
  - VIX Circuit Breakers
  - Daily Monitoring Requirements
  - Decay Tracking

## REGULATORY REFERENCES

| Topic | Regulation |
|-------|------------|
| Compliance Program | Rule 206(4)-7 |
| Code of Ethics | Rule 204A-1 |
| Custody | Rule 206(4)-2 |
| Advertising | Rule 206(4)-1 |
| Books and Records | Rule 204-2 |
| Privacy | Regulation S-P |
| Form ADV | Rule 204-3 |
| Pay-to-Play | Rule 206(4)-5 |
| Leveraged ETFs | FINRA Notice 09-31, 09-65 |

---

## ANNUAL COMPLIANCE CALENDAR

| Month | Task | Responsible |
|-------|------|-------------|
| January | Annual ADV Amendment | CCO |
| February | Annual Compliance Review | CCO |
| March | K-1 Distribution | Tax Counsel |
| Quarterly | Holdings Reports Due | All Access Persons |
| Quarterly | NAV/Performance Review | CCO |
| June | Mid-Year Compliance Update | CCO |
| September | Cybersecurity Review | CCO |
| November | Form PF (if applicable) | CCO |
| December | Annual Certifications | All Staff |

---

*This Table of Contents provides a framework for a comprehensive compliance manual. Each section should be developed in detail with specific procedures appropriate to the Adviser's business.*
